name: Mt Mullo
description:
SAVE THE WORLD, ONE MISSILE AT A TIME

An unusual sudden surge in missile and bomb sightings around Mt Mullo can only be bad news. Keep the peace as a laid-back, peace-loving Yeti and save the world from this global assault.

 CONTROLS

Fly left and right with A and D.

Hold S to enter a dive and rack up double points!

HIT THESE

There's only one way to protect the world from these weapons of mass destruction - and that's head on.

AVOID THESE

Did you know Yetis are deathly allergic to clouds? No? Well you do now. Also I hear birds in the area are displaying remarkable strength, so I'd steer clear of them also.

Game-A-Month-Athon 

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where I've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! Smaller one this month to get back on schedule: September 2021.

Support my work by joining on Patreon!

Music

Bubamarija / Kashtanizma EP - Bubamara, Black Cat White Cat
